result.title: Nintendo Store
result.description:
Nintendo Store is a free app for browsing Nintendo consoles, accessories, games and merchandise. Here are some of the things you can do with the app!

◆ Shop on My Nintendo Store
You can use this app to check out Nintendo Switch 2/Nintendo Switch consoles, as well as all sorts of other products, then jump directly to My Nintendo Store to make purchases.

◆ Get notified about sales right away
You can choose to receive notifications when products on your Wish List go on sale.

◆ Check your play activity
You can check your play activity on Nintendo Switch 2/Nintendo Switch. If you have a Nintendo 3DS system or Wii U console, you can also check your old play activity up to the end of February, 2020!
Note: Your Nintendo Network ID must be linked to your Nintendo Account in order for you to be able to see Nintendo 3DS and Wii U play activity.

◆ Check in at events
You can use the app to check in at official Nintendo stores and events and earn any related rewards! You can view your check-in activity in the app.

◆ Hear about the latest Nintendo products and activities
You can receive news about Nintendo games, merchandise, events and more!

Notes:
● Persistent internet and compatible smart device required. Data charges may apply. 
● Android 10.0 or later is required to use this app.
● A Nintendo Account is required to use some of this app's features.
● May contain advertisement.

User Agreement: https://support.nintendo.com/jp/legal-notes/znej-eula-selector/index.html

result.developerLegalAddress: 11-1, KAMITOBAHOKODATECHO, MINAMI-KU, KYOTO, 京都府 601-8116, Japan
result.recentChanges:
・ Product search results can now be displayed in-app on the "Search" tab.
・ Performance for the "Search" and "Wish List" tabs has been improved.
・ You can now enlarge the product images displayed on the details page for a product.
・ Various issues are now resolved.
